程序包 ltseed.chatinmc.PlayerInteraction.GUI

类 PaginatedGUI

java.lang.Object
ltseed.chatinmc.PlayerInteraction.GUI.PaginatedGUI
public class PaginatedGUI extends Object
A paginated graphical user interface (GUI) for displaying multiple buttons on multiple pages.

    修饰符和类型

    void
    open(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, int page)
    Opens the GUI for the specified player on the specified page.
    private void

    Splits the list of all buttons into pages of 45 buttons each and stores them in the pages map.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • PaginatedGUI

      public PaginatedGUI(String title, List<Button> allButtons, List<Button> otherButtons)
      Constructs a new PaginatedGUI with the given title and buttons.
      参数:
      title - the title of the GUI
      allButtons - a list of all buttons to be displayed
      otherButtons - a list of additional buttons to be displayed on every page

  • 方法详细资料

    • setupPages

      private void setupPages()
      Splits the list of all buttons into pages of 45 buttons each and stores them in the pages map.

    • open

      public void open(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, int page)
      Opens the GUI for the specified player on the specified page.
      参数:
      player - the player to open the GUI for
      page - the page to open the GUI on
